selected_quotes: New in #gigascience: Ultra-deep seq enables high-fidelity recovery of biodiversity for bulk arthropod samples w/o PCR
“GigaScience Full text Ultra-deep sequencing enables high-fidelity recovery of biodiversity for bulk arthropod …”
Ultra-deep sequencing enables high-fidelity recovery of biodiversity for bulk arthropod samples without PCR amp.
#GigaScience - Ultra-deep seq enables high-fidelity recovery of biodiversity for bulk arthropod samples w/out PCR

citation.abstract: Next-generation-sequencing (NGS) technologies combined with a classic DNA barcoding approach have enabled fast and credible measurement for biodiversity of mixed environmental samples. However, the PCR amplification involved in nearly all existing NGS protocols inevitably introduces taxonomic biases. In the present study, we developed new Illumina pipelines without PCR amplifications to analyze terrestrial arthropod communities.
citation.title: Ultra-deep sequencing enables high-fidelity recovery of biodiversity for bulk arthropod samples without PCR amplification
